name: Sequential Cutter
description: Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 1 turn when the caster's Health is 50% or more, and increases Defense of the caster for 1 turn when the caster's Health is less than 50%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

costs.name: Gold
costs.description: A currency used across all continents to purchase various goods.

name: Shield of Light
description: Covers an ally with the Shield of Light, dispelling two debuffs and granting a barrier for 2 turns before increasing Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Defense.

name: Goddess of Victory
description: Gives blessing to all allies, increasing Attack for 1 turn, and Combat Readiness by {{variable}}.
soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.
enhanced_description: Gives blessing to all allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns, and Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Grants increased Defense to the caster for 2 turns.
